Name: Dinesh Gundu Rao
Tweet: A desperate BJP in a bid to win elections in Karnataka is misusing the IT Dept to threaten, blackmail and defame the Congress party and its leaders. Some officers are behaving like the agents of BJP. Took out a massive protest against the IT Dept yesterday. #VendettaPoliticsByBJP  https://t.co/VEnGEGlqfZ
